description: Provides a pre-signed Amazon S3 URL in response for uploading your content.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: A case-sensitive name of the attached file being uploaded.

parameters.name: FileSizeInBytes
parameters.description: The size of the attached file in bytes.

parameters.name: FileUseCaseType
parameters.description: The use case for the file.

parameters.name: AssociatedResourceArn
parameters.description: The resource to which the attached file is (being) uploaded to. The supported resources are Cases and Email.

parameters.name: CreatedBy
parameters.description: Represents the identity that created the file. ConnectUserArn (string) --- An agent ARN representing a connect user. AWSIdentityArn (string) --- STS or IAM ARN representing the identity of API Caller. SDK users cannot populate this and this value is calculated automatically if ConnectUserArn is not provided.

nested_params.name: ConnectUserArn
nested_params.description: An agent ARN representing a connect user.

nested_params.name: AWSIdentityArn
nested_params.description: STS or IAM ARN representing the identity of API Caller. SDK users cannot populate this and this value is calculated automatically if ConnectUserArn is not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { "Tags": {"key1":"value1", "key2":"value2"} }. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: FileArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the attached file resource (ARN).

nested_items.name: FileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the attached file resource.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time of Creation of the file resource as an ISO timestamp. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2024-05-03T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: FileStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the attached file.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Represents the identity that created the file.

nested_items.name: ConnectUserArn
nested_items.description: An agent ARN representing a connect user.

nested_items.name: AWSIdentityArn
nested_items.description: STS or IAM ARN representing the identity of API Caller. SDK users cannot populate this and this value is calculated automatically if ConnectUserArn is not provided.

nested_items.name: UploadUrlMetadata
nested_items.description: The headers to be provided while uploading the file to the URL.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: A pre-signed S3 URL that should be used for uploading the attached file.

nested_items.name: UrlExpiry
nested_items.description: The expiration time of the URL in ISO timestamp. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: HeadersToInclude
nested_items.description: A map of headers that should be provided when uploading the attached file.
